Content.Text:
<FACE_TONI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Good morning, <MYNAME>!!
<PAGE>
<FACE_TONI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>What's the matter?! You should be more
cheerful when someone greets you!

<FACE_TONI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
<MYNAME>, good morning!!
<PAGE>
<FACE_TONI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>Why am I so energetic so early in the
morning? That's obvious! I love getting
up early to play.

<FACE_TONI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Good morning!!
<PAGE>
<FACE_TONI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>I wonder what I should play today. Hey
<MYNAME>, do you wanna play tag?

<FACE_TONI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Yo, <MYNAME>. You should give me a reward
for greeting you.
<PAGE>
<FACE_TONI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>What? Come on, it wouldn't hurt you to
give me a little something, would it?
You're so stingy!

<FACE_TONI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Yoo-hoo!! It feels good to great people
in a loud voice.
<PAGE>
<FACE_TONI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>You should try it too, <MYNAME>!
Oh? You're too embarrassed to? What
kind of an adult are you?

<FACE_TONI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hi, <MYNAME>. You're building up the town,
right? That's cool. I want to do that
too!
<PAGE>
<FACE_TONI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>I wanna make robot houses. Wouldn't that
be cool? Huh? It can't be done? Adults
always say stuff like that.

<FACE_TONI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What are you doing here, <MYNAME>? Come
on, tell me.

<FACE_TONI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good evening, <MYNAME>. Huh? It's late, so
I should get to bed?
<PAGE>
<FACE_TONI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>Yeah, yeah, I get it. You sound like my
mom, ya know.

<FACE_TONI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Oh, hi <MYNAME>. Have you ever seen a
ghost? I want to see one at least once.
<PAGE>
I hope one comes out tonight. If it
does, I'm gonna get its autograph!

<FACE_TONI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Yo, <MYNAME>. It's really sunny today,
huh? He he he, it's a perfect day for
playing!

<FACE_TONI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Yo, <MYNAME>. The sun doesn't come out on
rainy days, so it seems so dark.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>But, hey, we might see ghosts or
monsters today. Isn't that exciting? I'm
ready!

<FACE_TONI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
It's really hot, huh <MYNAME>? On days
like this, I want to go into the river
and grab some fish!
<PAGE>
And I should also grab something that my
mom hates and put it down her back. That
will really surprise her!

<FACE_TONI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Yo, <MYNAME>. Rain is fun, right? I need
to remember to go diving into some
puddles later.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ANGRY>Ah, don't tell my mom about what I just
said! The last thing I wanna do today is
get lectured!

<FACE_TONI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Yo, <MYNAME>. Don't just stand there,
let's play! Come on, hurry up!

<FACE_TONI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Yo, <MYNAME>. On rainy days, my mom's
always bugging me about helping her with
the housework.
<PAGE>
I wanna go out and play on rainy days
too, so I wish she'd just leave me
alone.

<FACE_TONI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Yo, <MYNAME>! Isn't winter great? I mean,
there's snow! It's just lying there
waiting to be used.
<PAGE>
You can make snowmen, have snowball
fights, and do all sorts of fun stuff.
Winter is the best!

<FACE_TONI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Yo, <MYNAME>! I wish more snow would fall.
Let's make a fortress later!

<FACE_TONI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Ah, <MYNAME>! What's it like outside? Did
you almost get blown away by the wind?
<PAGE>
<FACE_TONI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>Oh, it must be great to be an adult.
When I tried to go outside, my mom got
mad at me...

<FACE_TONI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Ah, <MYNAME>! What's it like outside? How
much snow is there out there?
<PAGE>
<FACE_TONI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>Oh, it must be great to be an adult.
When I tried to go outside, my mom got
mad at me...

<FACE_TONI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
You're in a relationship now, right
<MYNAME>? Nice going! Good luck with
marriage and everything!

<FACE_TONI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Yahoo! The forest is great!
<PAGE>
<FACE_TONI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>Should I grab some insects? Or maybe
chase some animals? Decisions,
decisions.

<FACE_TONI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Why don't you play in the forest,
<MYNAME>? It's really fun! Come on, I'll
show you how it's done. Follow me!

<FACE_TONI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Fishing is fun. Every now and then, I
catch an amazingly huge fish!

<FACE_TONI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Mom likes it when I bring back mushrooms
and other plants from the forest since
they make nice side dishes at dinner.

<FACE_TONI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
When I dropped a rock from high up on
the mountain, my mom got mad at me. She
said it's a dangerous thing to do...

<FACE_TONI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I saw a little sprite around here. I'm
really telling the truth. It disappeared
quickly though. I wonder what it was...

<FACE_TONI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
This your farm, right <MYNAME>? It's
really big! I could play forever in a
place this size!

<FACE_TONI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Hey <MYNAME>, can you build me a house
here? I know you can do it. You've got
the space here on this big farm.
<PAGE>
<FACE_TONI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>Oh, come on! Don't be stingy! You've got
no appreciation for childhood dreams.
That's why you're not more popular.

<FACE_TONI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
This mine is exciting! I wanna find an
amazing fossil!
<PAGE>
<FACE_ANGRY>What? Jewels? I've got no interest in
those... Unless we're talking about a
gigantic jewel. That'd be different.

<FACE_TONI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You know, <MYNAME>, you're going to need
minerals to build the things in my mom's
blueprints. You'd better gather a lot!

<FACE_TONI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
We sure came to a lonely town. My mom
says that more people will be here
before we know it, but I'm not so sure.
<PAGE>
I guess it's up to you, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_TONI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It seems like more people have come here
lately.
<PAGE>
It looks like my mom was right. You're
doing a good job, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_TONI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
This town sure has gotten bigger. I hear
we have a magician now. And we're
supposed to have fireworks sometime too.
<PAGE>
I wonder if this town will get even more
interesting now. It's exciting to think
about it.

<FACE_TONI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
This town is amazing. It's full of
interesting things and people.
<PAGE>
And there are tons of places to play.
It's the perfect town!

<FACE_TONI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Use Mom's blueprints to make an
interesting town, okay? I'm counting on
you!

<FACE_TONI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Pranks are fun. Did you play pranks when
you were a kid too, <MYNAME>?
<PAGE>
<FACE_TONI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>It's fun to set traps, and when people
fall into them, their faces are so
hilarious!

<FACE_TONI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I help my mom with work sometimes. It's
really fun.
<PAGE>
When I grow up, I wanna do the same job
that my mom does.

<FACE_TONI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
If you play a prank on my mom, she gets
really mad. It's super scary!
<PAGE>
You should try it <MYNAME>. You could put
something creepy in her hand or
something like that.

<FACE_TONI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
You make houses and things, right
<MYNAME>? That's cool. I want to try
doing that too.
<PAGE>
<FACE_TONI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>I wanna make a house that's full of
ghosts.
<PAGE>
<FACE_TONI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>It would scare all the people in the
town. I'm sure it would be really fun!

<FACE_TONI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
A long time ago, I played a prank at my
mom's work, and there was an explosion.
<PAGE>
<FACE_TONI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>My mom got really mad at me... and she
also cried a lot...
<PAGE>
<FACE_TONI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>So now I make sure never to play pranks
at Mom's work.

<FACE_TONI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
You're amazing, <MYNAME>. Managing a farm
is awesome enough, but you also use
Mom's blueprints to build up the town.
<PAGE>
From now on, you're the person I respect
the most after my mom! I mean it!

<FACE_TONI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Ah, it's omelet rice! Can I eat this?
Yay!!
<PAGE>
<FACE_TONI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>Alright, snack time! Munch, munch,
munch...
<PAGE>
<FACE_TONI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>It's sooo delicious! It's almost as good
as the omelet rice that my mom makes!

<FACE_TONI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Yay! This is just what I wanted.
<PAGE>
I didn't expect to get this from you,
<MYNAME>. Thanks!

<FACE_TONI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Is this for me? Yay!
<PAGE>
<FACE_TONI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>Ah, can you keep this a secret from my
mom? She's really picky about this type
of thing.

<FACE_TONI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Huh? Why are you giving this to me? Oh
well, I guess I'll take it, but only
this once.

<FACE_TONI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
Gross! What are you holding?! You want
me to give that to my mom?
<PAGE>
<FACE_TONI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>Give it to her yourself... I don't even
want to touch that thing.

<FACE_TONI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
Gross! Yogurt rice... <MYNAME>, when you
play a prank on someone, there has to be
an element of surprise!
<PAGE>
You can't just hand someone something
they don't like. It's boring. You're an
adult, so use your brain!

<FACE_TONI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
What are you doing?! I-I'm not afraid of
that big vegetable. E-Even if you hand
it to me, I won't be afraid!

<FACE_TONI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
What?! What is this vegetable? You want
me to give this to my mom?
<PAGE>
If I give this to her, dinner is going
to be nothing but vegetables. Oh man, I
don't know what to do.

<FACE_TONI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
That's a huge vegetable. Oh man, I don't
want to eat this. Okay, okay. I'll give
it to my mom.

<FACE_TONI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
What in the world?!
<PAGE>
<FACE_TONI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>... Your pranks are getting more
advanced, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
<FACE_TONI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>I can't believe you grew that huge
vegetable just to play a prank on me.
I'll get you back for this. You'll see!

<FACE_TONI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Why are you giving this to me? Mom said
I shouldn't take too much from other
people. I can't accept this.

<FACE_TONI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Look, I can't carry any more. Give it to
me tomorrow. Okay, <MYNAME>?

<FACE_TONI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Whoa! Omelet rice! Awesome! You knew
that today is my birthday?
<PAGE>
Thanks! Yum! This is good! Today is
turning out to be an amazing day!

<FACE_TONI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Yay! A birthday present! Thanks, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
Birthdays are great. It'd be awesome if
every day was my birthday. Don't ya
think so, <MYNAME>?

<FACE_TONI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Is this for me? Yay! A birthday present!
<PAGE>
You're one of my favorite grown-ups,
<MYNAME>. Thanks!

<FACE_TONI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You're giving me a birthday present?
Thanks, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_TONI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
You know, it is my birthday today... Oh
well, I guess I'll take this, but just
this once.

<FACE_TONI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
Gross! What are you holding? A birthday
present?
<PAGE>
For a grown-up, you don't have much
common sense. Did you even think about
this present at all?

<FACE_TONI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
Gross! Yogurt rice... You call this a
birthday present?
<PAGE>
<FACE_TONI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>This is the worst present I've ever
gotten. Sigh...

<FACE_TONI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
What are you doing? Don't you know that
it's my birthday today?
<PAGE>
I-I'm not afraid of that big vegetable.
E-Even if you hand it to me, I
I won't be afraid!

<FACE_TONI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
Ugh, what's this big vegetable here for?
You want me to eat it? It's my birthday
today, ya know!
<PAGE>
You remember this, <MYNAME>! I'm going to
play a prank on you so bad that you'll
wish you'd never done this!

<FACE_TONI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
What a huge vegetable... I don't want to
eat something like this on my birthday.
Huh? You'll tell my mom?
<PAGE>
F-Fine. I'll eat it... Munch, munch,
munch. Ugh, gross! Are you satisfied
now?

<FACE_TONI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
Is this supposed to be a birthday
present? Couldn't you have thought of
something else?!
<PAGE>
You know that bigger isn't always
better, right? If only this were a big
plate of omelet rice. Sigh...

<FACE_TONI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This chick looks weak. She needs to
toughen up.

<FACE_TONI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hmm. This chicken doesn't look very
cool.

<FACE_TONI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Whoa, awesome! I've never seen anything
like it! I'm going to tell everyone all
about it!

<FACE_TONI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Hahaha. Stop it. My hand tickles when
it's licked like that.

<FACE_TONI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Let me carry this dog. Wow, this guy's
heavier than a normal dog. What's up
with that?

<FACE_TONI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I wish I had a cool dog like this.
<PAGE>
But I don't think my mom would allow it.
I guess I'll just have to come here to
your farm to see this dog.

<FACE_TONI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Let me carry the dog. Ugh, whoa, I can't
do it. How did the big guy get to be
this size?

<FACE_TONI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You know, cat's are pretty unfriendly.
They always run off somewhere. That's
no fun!

<FACE_TONI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I bet a cat this big wouldn't go running
off anywhere. I'd like to have a cat
like this.

<FACE_TONI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This cat's hair is long, huh? It must be
hot under all that hair.

<FACE_TONI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Pwa ha ha ha ha! This cat looks like a
ball! How funny!

<FACE_TONI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Thanks, <MYNAME>. Oh, that reminds me, I
need to give a flower to my mom.

<FACE_TONI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Yay! Delicious sweets!
<PAGE>
My mom might get mad if she sees me with
this, so I'm going to hide it for now.
I'll definitely eat it later though!

<FACE_TONI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What do you use this for? <MYNAME>, your
face is red. What's the matter?

<FACE_TONI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Ah, I've seen one of these. My mom has
one. When I tried to use it for a prank,
she got mad at me.

<FACE_TONI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
There's nothing special about that bird.
They're flying all over the place around
here.

<FACE_TONI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I like to catch those often myself.
They're really fast.

<FACE_TONI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Turtles are too slow and easy to catch.
It's just boring.

<FACE_TONI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Hey, I'm gonna give you something
nice! Ta-da!
<PAGE>
It's your birthday, right <MYNAME>? I'm
giving you this to thank you for always
playing with me.

<FACE_TONI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hey <MYNAME>, my mom told me that it's
your birthday.
<PAGE>
I don't have a present for you. Why
should a kid like me give a present to
a grown-up like you?

<FACE_TONI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hey, <MYNAME>. I haven't seen you around
lately. Let's play sometime!

... I'm... sorry... I won't. ..do it
again... zzz... zzz... mmmm... zzz...

<FACE_TONI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'm eating right now. You mind if we
talk later?

<FACE_TONI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Stone benches are wild and cool. So you
know my mom designed this, right? As
usual, she did a good job.

<FACE_TONI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
This is a nice barrel. I bet it'd be fun
to roll it around.
<PAGE>
<FACE_TONI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>Huh? I can't because it's dangerous?!
You're no fun!

<FACE_TONI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
This wooden box is big. I bet I could
fit inside it. Hey, I can make it into
a secret base!
<PAGE>
<FACE_TONI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>Now that I think about it, I'd better
not. My mom designed this, so I'm sure
she'd get mad if I used it as a base.

<FACE_TONI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Did you make this scarecrow? Oh, I see,
you just put it together. It was my mom
who designed it.
<PAGE>
Still, this is pretty good work coming
from you, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_TONI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Are you using this old wagon anymore?
<PAGE>
Okay, then I can ride in it, right? I
bet it'd be fun.
<PAGE>
<FACE_TONI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>Hmm, now that I think about it, I'd
better not. My mom designed this, so I'm
sure she'd get mad if I rode in it.

<FACE_TONI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I bet it'd be fun to ride in this wagon.
Can I give it a try?
<PAGE>
<FACE_TONI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>Hmm, now that I think about it, I'd
better not. My mom designed this, so I'm
sure she'd get mad if I rode in it.

<FACE_TONI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
What are stone pillars for? They look
cool, but I don't know what you'd use
one for.

<FACE_TONI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This totem pole is small. If you're
going to build one, you might as well
make it big.

<FACE_TONI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Yay! A big totem pole!
<PAGE>
It's perfect. Did you make this, <MYNAME>?
You did a really good job!

<FACE_TONI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I know the story behind this dog statue.
It's about a faithful dog, right?
<PAGE>
And while he's waiting for his master,
Medusa appears and turns him to stone,
right? Wait a second, that sounds wrong.
<PAGE>
<FACE_TONI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>My mom told me the story, but... She'll
be mad if she finds out I forgot, so
please don't tell her, okay?

<FACE_TONI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Sun statues are supposed to have
mysterious powers, right?
<PAGE>
I need to use this statue's power to get
smarter so that I don't have to study
anymore.

<FACE_TONI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That woman is holding a huge fork. She
must be planning on eating something
enormous.

<FACE_TONI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That woman is holding a shield, but she
can't fight with just a shield. You
should give her a sword too.

<FACE_TONI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This fountain is funny! I wish my mom
would design something interesting like
this.

<FACE_TONI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
My mom designed this fountain, right?
It's pretty normal-looking, isn't it?

<FACE_TONI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
My mom designed this fountain, right? It
takes up a lot of space, so I guess it
symbolizes a plaza or something.

<FACE_TONI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Is this well deep? I want to go in and
take a look.
<PAGE>
<FACE_TONI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>Don't worry, I won't go in now. If my
mom found out, she'd give me a noogie.
I'll come back when nobody's around.

<FACE_TONI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This is called a watchtower, right? My
mom told me about these.
<PAGE>
It's not that tall, but it'd be an okay
place to play in.

<FACE_TONI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Why is there an anchor here? Could
it be connected to a large ship in the
sky by an invisible chain?
<PAGE>
<FACE_TONI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>... Now I see. This is an alien base for
conquering the earth.
<PAGE>
Hey, don't look at me like that. I'm
just an innocent child using his
imagination.

<FACE_TONI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I like hammocks. You gotta have them
when you're camping.
<PAGE>
With a hammock, you can sleep in the
forest, in the mountains, and just
about everywhere else.

<FACE_TONI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That's an interesting stone marker. It
looks like something's written on it,
but I can't understand it at all.
<PAGE>
Can you make it out, <MYNAME>? I
didn't think so. I guess that's why they
call it a mysterious stone marker.

<FACE_TONI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
This thing looks cool! Hey, I can ride
on it, right?
<PAGE>
<FACE_TONI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>What? You think it's dangerous? Come on,
it can't even go that fast, can it?
Oh man, you're no fun!

<FACE_TONI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
A mechanical lion. That's a kid's ride.
I'm not interested in it.
<PAGE>
But if you need someone to test it, I
could ride it for you.
<PAGE>
You don't need anyone to test it? I
see... Well then maybe I could just ride
it? No? Fine. You're no fun!

<FACE_TONI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
It's a toy robot! He's so cool looking!
Hey, he moves, right?
<PAGE>
<FACE_TONI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>Can you please figure out some way to
make him move? No?
<PAGE>
Fine. It's fun just looking at him, so I
guess I'll just have to settle with
that.

<FACE_TONI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I like bamboo for some reason. I guess I
get that from my mom.
<PAGE>
She tells me I need to live straight
like bamboo.

<FACE_TONI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This bush looks like a lion... I wonder
how it was made to look like this.
<PAGE>
You made it?! That's amazing, <MYNAME>!
You should trim more bushes to look
like other animals.

<FACE_TONI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This bush looks like a mammoth... I
wonder how it was made to look like
this.
<PAGE>
You made it?! That's amazing, <MYNAME>!
You should make a dinosaur next time.

<FACE_TONI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Bamboo sprouts grow in bamboo groves,
right? Let me know if you see some. If
ya do, I'll be sure to come and get 'em.

<FACE_TONI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Did you make this cow statue, <MYNAME>?
<PAGE>
Wow... You might be even better than
Mom.

<FACE_TONI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Did you make this sheep statue, <MYNAME>?
<PAGE>
You might be even better than Mom.

<FACE_TONI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Did you make this chicken statue,
<MYNAME>?
<PAGE>
Wow... You might be even better than
Mom.

<FACE_TONI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Did you make this horse statue, <MYNAME>?
<PAGE>
You might be even better than Mom.

<FACE_TONI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This tricycle doesn't look like you
could ride on it.
<PAGE>
Oh, it's just for decoration.

<FACE_TONI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
My mom designed this stone fence, right?
It's kind of dull, but I like how solid
and strong it is.

<FACE_TONI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I like jumping over guard rails. It's
fun. But a lot of times my feet get
caught, and I fall over.

<FACE_TONI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I like this stone wall that my mom
designed. It reminds me of a castle.
Now's not the time to give a present.

<FACE_TONI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
My mom likes going to the hair salon,
but I never go. I don't want them to
